description: This file defines a React component called Sidebar that manages and displays a list of conversation objects. It supports adding new conversations, selecting an existing conversation, and persists the conversation list in local storage.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: React functional component that renders the sidebar UI for managing conversations.

methods.name: handleAdd
methods.description: Handles the creation of a new conversation, updates state, and persists data to local storage.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Handles the selection of a conversation, updates state, and dispatches a custom event.
